channel.title: Bankpin help
channel.description:
Basically, I want the command to be like this :
[code]::removepin (current pin)[/code] So that you have to enter your current pin, to remove it.
Currently my command only allows you to remove it, you don't even have to enter the current pin a account has. I don't exactly know what to do. ;\

item.title: Bankpin help
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Hmm, try messing around with it since I don’t exactly have a copy of your source to test it out, what is your source anyway?

Read full topic

item.title: Bankpin help
item.dc:creator: @T7S T7S
item.description:
@T7S wrote:

[quote=“xxx123xxx, post:8, topic:459804”][code]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“removepin”)) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
if (Integer.parseInt(args[1]) == c.bankpin) {
c.bankpin = 0;
} else {
c.sendMessage(“incorrect bank pin”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“incorrect bank pin length”);
} } catch(Exception e) {

                              }}

[/code]
Alrighty, try it now[/quote]

Nope.

Read full topic

Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Bankpin help
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("removepin")) {
	try {
		String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
			if (args.length == 4 && Integer.parseInt(args[1]) = c.bankpin) {
				c.bankpin = 0;
			 } else {
			 	c.sendMessage("either incorrect bank pin or bank pin length");
			 }             } catch(Exception e) {
					
				  }}

try this? I really don’t know your source that well so tell me if I messed anything up

Read full topic

item.title: Bankpin help
item.dc:creator: @T7S T7S
item.description:
@T7S wrote:

xxx123xxx:

can you post the code for that command, and do you know where the pin is stored, in the char file?

It’s stored in the players character file.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("removepin")) { if(c.bankpin >= 1) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); c.bankpin = 0; if(c.bankpin == 0) { c.sendMessage("You don't have a bank pin."); return; } } }
It’s basic, but works.

Read full topic
